name: Táng Chuánqí: Shàng Yuáncháng Gān Xíng
summary: A three-thousand-mile journey of exile, a mystery of untold evil, when strange legends are decoded into reports of social pathology, when the joy of wuxia revenge collides with the ironclad fortress of power, from bandits slaughtering villages to the powerful committing cannibalism, who is not a lamb to be slaughtered in troubled times? This game focuses on the historical backdrop of the An-Shi Rebellion during the Tang Dynasty, and every choice the player makes will mark their character's fate.
developers: Hǔ Bǎo Miāo Miāo Miāo Zhìzuò Zǔ
publishers: Hǔ Bǎo Miāo Miāo Miāo Zhìzuò Zǔ
